about.details:
Incorporated in 2011, Sahaj Fashions Limited manufactures fabric for garment making, home furnishings, and industrial applications.

The company manufactures cotton suiting fabric and cotton shirting fabric, polyester-based and cotton-polyster blended fabrics. It also manufactures cotton yarn-dyed fabrics which are its most in-demand product in the garment manufacturing industry.

Sahaj's product list includes Piece Dyed Shirtings, Cotton Yarn Dyed Shirtings, Cotton yarn dyed Chambray, and Cotton fabric for Self Designed Shirting from count 40s to 100s in the Shirtings segment; Cotton Spandex Fabric, Cotton Suiting Fabric, Cotton Dobby Designs, and Cotton Power Lycra Fabrics in the Suitings segment; Slub Yarn Fabrics and Linen Fabrics in the Fancy Fabrics segment; and Cotton Duck Fabric, Cotton Drill Fabric, Cotton Twill Fabric, and Cotton Tusser Fabric in the Industrial Cloth segment.

Sahaj Fashions' manufacturing unit is located on Kishangarh Bhilwara Express Highway i.e. NH 79, at village Srinagar District Ajmer.

The company recorded Rs. 9,097.58 Lakhs in total revenue for the financial periods ending February 28, 2023.

faqs.question: What is the Sahaj Fashions IPO?
faqs.answer:
Sahaj Fashions IPO is a SME IPO of 4652000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹13.96 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹30 per share. The minimum order quantity is 4000.

The IPO opens on August 25, 2023, and closes on August 29, 2023.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Sahaj Fashions IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Sahaj Fashions IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Sahaj Fashions IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Sahaj Fashions IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Sahaj Fashions IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Sahaj Fashions IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Sahaj Fashions IPO opens on August 25, 2023 and closes on August 29, 2023.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Sahaj Fashions IPO?
faqs.answer: Sahaj Fashions IPO lot size is 4000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,20,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Sahaj Fashions IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Sahaj Fashions IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Sahaj Fashions IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Sahaj Fashions IPO will be done on Friday, September 1, 2023, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, September 5, 2023. Check the Sahaj Fashions IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Sahaj Fashions IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Sahaj Fashions IPO listing date is on Wednesday, September 6, 2023.
